headline: Honeywell (HON) to Support Major Expansion at Nigeria’s Dangote Refinery by 2028
summary: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is one of the best industrial stocks to buy. On November 25, Honeywell revealed that Dangote Petroleum Refinery and Petrochemicals FZE will rely on its cutting-edge technology, services, catalysts, and equipment to increase crude processing capabilities and double production at its Lekki refinery in Nigeria by 2028. Dangote will utilize the […]
